text: Léon Tallon (born 1908, date of death unknown) was a French swimmer. He competed in the men's 200 metre breaststroke event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Male breaststroke swimmers
title: Léon Tallon
